page.description: Follow the links below to read the release notes for the current release and pre-release versions of Alpha Anywhere.

description.p: *[Released April 19, 2018]*. Alpha Anywhere 4.5.4 includes additional features for Security and the Application Server for IIS. *[link:Click here to learn more about Alpha Anywhere 4.5.4@aav4_5_4%20overview]*.

Alpha Anywhere 4.5.4 builds on Alpha Anywhere 4.5.3, which was released on April 9, 2018. Alpha Anywhere Anywhere 4.5.3 was a major release with a number of new features in virtually every part of Alpha Anywhere, with special emphasis on features related to data integration and security. *[link:Click here to learn more about Alpha Anywhere 4.5.3@aav4_5_3%20overview]*.

section.title: Release Videos

description.p: Every release of Alpha Anywhere includes new videos. Click the link below for a list of videos released with the version of Alpha Anywhere listed.

section.note: Alpha Anywhere 1.0 was the successor to Alpha Five Version 11.

description.p: The Release Notes describes updates and fixes made to Alpha Anywhere since its initial release. *[extlink:Click here@http://aadocuments.s3.amazonaws.com/ReleaseNotes/ReleaseNotes.Html]* to view the release notes.

In addition to the official updates that Alpha Software makes available from time to time (which are described in this document), we also make available our internal pre-release builds that allow you to see what features have been added and what bugs have been fixed since the last official update. The features and bug fixes in the pre-release build will be part of the next official update.
